newsArticles.title: OpenAI Might Get Lots of Money to Grow Bigger
newsArticles.summary: OpenAI, who made a super smart robot that talks to you, is trying to get more money to become even bigger and better!

newsArticles.title: Facebook's Big Company Gets a Time-out for Showing No-No Ads
newsArticles.summary: Meta, the big company that owns Facebook, got a big 'Oops!' from Italy for showing people ads about games that should not be shown.

newsArticles.title: The Leaders Want More Electric Cars to Zoom Around!
newsArticles.summary: President Biden and his friends have a plan to make more electric cars that don't need gas to go. They hope a lot of people will choose these cool, quiet cars.

newsArticles.title: Microsoft's New Helper is Like a Super Smart Paperclip
newsArticles.summary: Microsoft has a new helper for people who make computer stuff. It's really smart, like a superhero version of Clippy, the paperclip friend we used to have on the computer!

newsArticles.title: India Uses Robot Brains to Predict Sunshine and Rain
newsArticles.summary: India is using robot brains to guess the weather better, so they can tell if there will be too much rain or not enough. This helps everyone get ready for what's coming!

latestNews.title: Salesforce Becomes Super Strong After a Big Storm
latestNews.summary: Salesforce, a giant cloud company, has become super strong after going through a lot of tough times. Now it's ready to grow big and tall like a tree!
